channel.title: [HELP] I need sum help [HELP]
channel.description: Ok, I have three questions. I need to know where to go to change the xp rates on my server. I also need to know howto change the amount of money you get while thieiving. And finally I want to know how to chaneg the amount of damage a weapon does. Please help. Thanks. :)

item.title: [HELP] I need sum help [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Strife I forgot to say to change the thieving money do what I said only do it in Client.java, my bad forgot to add.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] I need sum help [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“StrifeScape, post:6, topic:275304”][quote author=Cuban0 Ftw link=topic=363684.msg2761898#msg2761898 date=1240593398]
You can change the amount of damage a weapon does by going in Item.cfg. You can change the amount of money you get from thieving by changing it down in the object id example:

objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 53, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 2m", 99, 650*playerLevel[17], 995, 2000000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 20k", 1, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 20000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 50k", 50, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }
Except you would change the objectID to the the stall you want to change the amount of money to, the number after the 995 represents the amount of money you’ll get after thieving it. I forgot how to change the Exp rates though, sorry.

[/quote]

Where is the Item.cfg loacted, I cant seem to find it?[/quote]
Config folder.

Read full topic

objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 53, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 2m", 99, 650*playerLevel[17], 995, 2000000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 20k", 1, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 20000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 50k", 50, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }
Except you would change the objectID to the the stall you want to change the amount of money to, the number after the 995 represents the amount of money you’ll get after thieving it. I forgot how to change the Exp rates though, sorry.[/quote]

Where is the Item.cfg loacted, I cant seem to find it?

item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

You can change the amount of damage a weapon does by going in Item.cfg. You can change the amount of money you get from thieving by changing it down in the object id example:

objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 53, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 2m", 99, 650*playerLevel[17], 995, 2000000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 20k", 1, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 20000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 50k", 50, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }
Except you would change the objectID to the the stall you want to change the amount of money to, the number after the 995 represents the amount of money you’ll get after thieving it. I forgot how to change the Exp rates though, sorry.
